13 // platform
14 #if defined(__EMSCRIPTEN__)
15 #define LN_EMSCRIPTEN
16 #define LN_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
17 #elif defined(__ANDROID__)
18 #define LN_OS_ANDROID
19 #define LN_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
20 #elif (defined(_WIN32) || defined(__WIN32__) || defined(WIN32) || defined(__CYGWIN__) || defined(Q_OS_WIN))
21 #define LN_OS_WIN32
22 #define LN_OS_DESKTOP
23 #elif defined(__APPLE__) && (defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__xlC__) || defined(__xlc__))
24 #define LN_OS_DARWIN
25 #define LN_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
26 #else
27 #define LN_OS_LINUX
28 #define LN_X11
29 #define LN_OS_FAMILY_UNIX
30 #define LN_OS_DESKTOP
31 #endif
32 
33 #if defined(LN_OS_DARWIN)
34 # include <TargetConditionals.h>
35 # if (defined(TARGET_OS_EMBEDDED) && TARGET_OS_EMBEDDED) || (defined(TARGET_OS_IPHONE) && TARGET_OS_IPHONE) || (defined(TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR) && TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR)
36 # define LN_OS_IOS
37 # elif defined(TARGET_OS_MAC) && TARGET_OS_MAC
38 # define LN_OS_MAC
39 # define LN_OS_DESKTOP
40 # endif
41 #endif

76 // DLL exports
77 #if defined(LUMINO_DLL) && defined(LUMINO_BUILD_DLL)
78 /* LUMINO_DLL と LUMINO_BUILD_DLL の同時定義は禁止。
79  * LUMINO_DLL はライブラリをDLLとして使うとき、
80  * LUMINO_BUILD_DLL はライブラリ本体をビルドするときにのみ使用する。
81  */
82 #error "You must not have both LUMINO_DLL and LUMINO_BUILD_DLL defined"
83 #endif
84 
85 #if defined(_WIN32) && defined(LUMINO_BUILD_DLL)
86 #define LN_API __declspec(dllexport)
87 #elif defined(_WIN32) && defined(LUMINO_DLL)
88 #define LN_API __declspec(dllimport)
89 #elif defined(__GNUC__) && defined(LUMINO_BUILD_DLL)
90 #define LN_API __attribute__((visibility("default")))
91 #else
92 #define LN_API
93 #endif

110 #ifdef LN_USTRING16
111 #define __LT(x) u##x
112 #define _TT(x) u##x
113 #define _LT(x) __LT(x)
114 #define TTCHAR char16_t
115 //#define _U(x) (u##x)
116 namespace ln {
117 using Char = char16_t;
118 }
119 
120 #else
121 #define __LT(x) L##x
122 #define _TT(x) L##x
123 #define _LT(x) __LT(x)
124 #define TTCHAR wchar_t
125 //#define _U(x) (L##x)
126 namespace ln {
127 using Char = wchar_t;
128 }
129 
130 #endif
131 #else
132 #endif

160 namespace detail {
161 void notifyAbort(const char* file, int line, const char* message);
162 } // namespace detail
163 } // namespace ln
164 
165 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
166 // CHECK macro
167 
168 #ifdef LN_DEBUG
169 # define LN_DCHECK_ENABLED
170 #endif
171 
172 #if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ > 2) && defined(__OPTIMIZE__)
173 # define LN_LIKELY(expr) (__builtin_expect(!!(expr), 1))
174 # define LN_UNLIKELY(expr) (__builtin_expect(!!(expr), 0))
175 #else
176 # define LN_LIKELY(expr) (1 == !!(expr))
177 # define LN_UNLIKELY(expr) (0 == !!(expr))
178 #endif
179 
180 #ifndef LN_CHECK_ABORT
181 # include <stdlib.h>
182 # define LN_CHECK_ABORT ::ln::detail::notifyAbort(__FILE__, __LINE__, "abort.");
183 #endif
184 
185 #ifndef LN_CHECK
186 # define LN_CHECK(expr) if (!LN_LIKELY(expr)) { printf("%s:%u: abort: %s\n", (__FILE__), (unsigned)(__LINE__), (#expr)); LN_CHECK_ABORT; }
187 #endif
188 
189 #ifdef LN_DCHECK_ENABLED
190 # define LN_DCHECK(...) LN_CHECK(__VA_ARGS__);
191 #else
192 # define LN_DCHECK(expr) ((void)(expr));
193 #endif
194 
195 #ifndef LN_SAFE_FREE
196 #define LN_SAFE_FREE( p ) { if ( p ) { free( ( p ) ); ( p ) = NULL; } }
197 #endif
198 
199 #ifndef LN_SAFE_DELETE
200 #define LN_SAFE_DELETE( p ) { if ( p ) { delete ( p ); ( p ) = NULL; } }
201 #endif
202 
203 #ifndef LN_SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
204 #define LN_SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY( p ) { if ( p ) { delete[] ( p ); ( p ) = NULL; } }
205 #endif
206 
207 #ifndef LN_OPERATOR_NEW
208 #define LN_OPERATOR_NEW(size) ::operator new(size)
209 #endif
210 
211 #ifndef LN_OPERATOR_DELETE
212 #define LN_OPERATOR_DELETE(ptr) { ::operator delete(ptr); (ptr) = 0; }
213 #endif
214 
215 #ifndef LN_INTERNAL_ACCESS
216 #define LN_INTERNAL_ACCESS private
217 #endif
218 
219 #ifndef LN_PROTECTED_INTERNAL_ACCESS
220 #define LN_PROTECTED_INTERNAL_ACCESS protected
221 #endif
222 
223 #ifndef LN_ARRAY_SIZE_OF
224 #define LN_ARRAY_SIZE_OF(ary) ( sizeof(ary) / sizeof( ary[0] ) )
225 #endif
226 
227 #ifndef LN_MEMBER_OFFSETOF
228 #define LN_MEMBER_OFFSETOF(type, member) (reinterpret_cast<std::size_t>(&reinterpret_cast<char const volatile&>(((type*)0)->member)))
229 #endif
230 
231 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
232 #include <stdint.h>
233 #include <math.h> // for macOS on AzurePipelines. TODO: https://github.com/PointCloudLibrary/pcl/issues/2601
234 
235 #if WCHAR_MAX <= 0xffff
236 #define LN_WCHAR_16
237 #elif WCHAR_MAX <= 0xffffffff
238 #define LN_WCHAR_32
239 #else
240 #error "size of wchar_t is too large."
241 #endif
242 
244 namespace ln {
245 
246 using byte_t = unsigned char;
247 
248 #ifdef LN_WCHAR_16
249  typedef uint8_t UTF8;
250  typedef wchar_t UTF16; // for watch by debugger
251  typedef uint32_t UTF32;
252 #else
253  typedef uint8_t UTF8;
254  typedef uint16_t UTF16;
255  typedef uint32_t UTF32;
256 #endif
257 
258 } // namespace ln
259 
260 #define LN_NEW new
261 
262 // This should be used within the private: declaration of the class
263 #define LN_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(typeName) \
264  typeName(const typeName&) = delete; \
265  void operator=(const typeName&) = delete
266 
267 // increment COM reference count
268 #define LN_COM_SAFE_ADDREF(p) { if (p) { (p)->AddRef(); } }
269 
270 // decrement COM reference count
271 #define LN_COM_SAFE_RELEASE(p) { if (p) { (p)->Release(); (p)= nullptr; } }
272 
273 // constexpr macro
274 #if defined(__clang__)
275 #define LN_CONSTEXPR constexpr
276 #elif defined(__GNUC__) || defined(__GNUG__)
277 #define LN_CONSTEXPR
278 #elif !defined(_MSC_VER) || _MSC_VER >= 1900
279 #define LN_CONSTEXPR constexpr
280 #else
281 #define LN_CONSTEXPR
282 #endif
283 
284 // noexcept macro
285 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER < 1900
286 #define LN_NOEXCEPT
287 #else
288 #define LN_NOEXCEPT noexcept
289 #endif
290 
291 #ifndef LN_MAX
292 #define LN_MAX(a,b) (((a) > (b)) ? (a) : (b))
293 #endif
294 
295 #ifndef LN_MIN
296 #define LN_MIN(a,b) (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))
297 #endif
